name: Desert of the Dead (itch)
description:
This Game was made with Godot using LootLocker for Leaderboards,

You will have to survive as long as possible killing zombies to raise your score.

Controls:

W,A,S,D to move 

mouse to aim .

Left Mouse Button to shoot.

When the Reload word show just let go of the mouse button to reload.

Every minute one of three guns will spawn and you will receive 100 points.

the scoreboard in the game only updates the next time you start the game.
